inference:
Solution:
The area of the larger square is $7^2 = 49$ square units. The area of the smaller square is $3^2 = 9$ square units. The area of the black region is the area of the larger square minus the area of the smaller square: $49 - 9 = \boxed{40}.$
Final Answer: $\boxed{40}.$ I hope it is correct.
ground_truth: The area of the black region is the difference between the area of the larger square and the area of the smaller square which has been removed: $7^2-3^2=\boxed{40}$ square units.
